title: "Swen Kuh is a Winner of the Social Statistics Section Inaugural Poster Competition - JSM 2018"
date: "04-16-2021"
categories: [news, phd student]

We were recently informed that Ms. Kuh was one of two winners of the [inaugural poster competition](https://twitter.com/AsaphChun/status/1025028890870214656) held by the Social Statistics Section of the American Statistical Association - Joint Statistics Meeting 2018 held in Vancouver B.C.
